title: Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Jonathan Milan Wins Crash-Marred Sprint, Tim Merlier Relegated
content:
Tadej Pogačar stays safe inside his own 'bubble' to avoid mishap in tense transition stage as Giro hits halfway mark: 'I always stay in the bubble, with two meters around me.'

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Jonathan Milan Wins Crash-Marred Sprint, Tim Merlier Relegated on Velo.
author: ahood
